question.title: Repeated Substrings
question.content:
You are given a string of size ‘N’ consisting of only characters ‘a’,’c’,’g’ and ’t’. You have to find all the sub-strings of the given string of length 10 that is occurring more than once in the given string.

Input Format:
The first line of input contains an integer ‘T’ denoting the number of test cases. 

The first line of each test case consists of a single integer ‘N’ denoting the size of the string.

The next line consists of ‘N’ length string consisting of only  ‘a’,’c’,’g’ and ’t’.
Output Format:
For each test case, return all possible sub-strings of size 10 that occurs more than one time. You may return the substrings in any order.
Constraints:
1 <= ’T’ <= 50
1 <= ’N’ <= 5* 10^3
s[i] = {‘a’,‘c’,’g’ ,’t’ }

Time Limit: 1 sec
Note:
You do not need to print anything, it has already been taken care of. Just implement the given function.
Sample Input 1
2
12
aaaaaaaaaaab
20
aaagggccctaaagggccct
Sample Output 1
aaaaaaaaaa
aaagggccct
Sample Output Explanation
For First Test-case total number of substrings of size 10 are:-
[aaaaaaaaaa,aaaaaaaaaa,aaaaaaaaab]
From the above substrings, aaaaaaaaaa occurs more than once.

For SecondTestcase total number of substrings of size 10 are:-
[aaagggccct,aagggcccta,agggccctaa,gggccctaaa,ggccctaaag,gccctaaagg, ccctaaaggg, cctaaagggc ,ctaaagggcc ,taaagggccc ,aaagggccct]

From the above substrings, aaagggccct occurs more than once.
Sample Input 2
2
11
ggggggggggg
20
aaaaagggggaaaaaggggg
Sample Output 2
gggggggggg
aaaaaggggg

rephrased.body: Given a string of length 'N' consisting only of the characters 'a', 'c', 'g', and 't', find all substrings of length 10 that appear more than once in the string.

testcases.explanation:
Test Case 1:
The string 'aaaaaaaaaaab' has the following substrings of length 10: 'aaaaaaaaaa', 'aaaaaaaaaa', and 'aaaaaaaaab'. The substring 'aaaaaaaaaa' appears more than once.

Test Case 2:
The string 'aaagggccctaaagggccct' has the following substrings of length 10: 'aaagggccct', 'aagggcccta', 'agggccctaa', 'gggccctaaa', 'ggccctaaag', 'gccctaaagg', 'ccctaaaggg', 'cctaaagggc', 'ctaaagggcc', 'taaagggccc', 'aaagggccct'. The substring 'aaagggccct' appears more than once.

Test Case 1:
The string 'ggggggggggg' has substrings of length 10: 'gggggggggg', 'gggggggggg'. The substring 'gggggggggg' appears more than once.

Test Case 2:
The string 'aaaaagggggaaaaaggggg' has substrings of length 10: 'aaaaaggggg', 'aaaaggggga', 'aaagggggaa', 'aagggggaaa', 'agggggaaaa', 'gggggaaaaa', 'gggggaaaaa', 'ggggaagaaa', 'ggaaagaaaa', 'gaaagaaaaa', 'aaaaggggg', 'aaaaggggg'. The substring 'aaaaaggggg' appears more than once.

hints: Store the count of substrings of length 10.
